Heydar Aliyev's heart was beaten with Azerbaijan. #Azerbaijan
Heydar Aliyev's policy resides in Azerbaijan and shows itself in all directions. #Azerbaijan
As a result of the development, transportation and export of our natural resources, we have gained economic independence (cont) http://tl.gd/ai5ma3
Azerbaijan has been rapidly developing over the past seven years in terms of economic development. #Azerbaijan
Our economy has grown nearly three times. Industrial production increased 3 times, poverty decreased 5 times. #Azerbaijan
Today, Azerbaijan has a very important role in energy security not only in the region, but also on the continent. #Azerbaijan
Not only our initiatives, suggestions and projects we have implemented (cont) http://tl.gd/ai5n5c
The Baku-Tbilisi-Ceyhan project has an exceptional role in strengthening Azerbaijan's economic independence. #Azerbaijan
On the big Shah Deniz gas field, signed on the initiative of Heydar Aliyev in 1996 (cont) http://tl.gd/ai5nlv
Our independence is strengthened. Our economic opportunities, our role in the region are growing and our international positions are strengthened. #Azerbaijan
Today, Azerbaijan is a modern country that dynamically develops its own needs. #Azerbaijan
The projects we are implementing and implementing also involve partner countries. Azerbaijan (cont) http://tl.gd/ai5oeu
The projects are initiated and implemented by us. Azerbaijan has (cont) http://tl.gd/ai5oiv
Azerbaijan has become a great place for intercultural dialogue worldwide. #Azerbaijan
We must do our best to further strengthen and develop our country, and continue to do so (cont) http://tl.gd/ai5oq2
Independence is our greatest asset, the greatest blessing, the greatest value. #Azerbaijan
